home.title: Welcome
home.introduction:
A full-stack developer who enjoys solving problems and building products. I have worked with small to medium size companies and NGOs where I was able to add values to the organization through my expertise and skills.

Being passionate about technologies, I always want to learn new skills and work on projects that require me to reach outside of my comfort zone and knowledge.

When I am not working, I enjoy watching movies, listenning to music and helping people with technology challenges.
